column4: quick question...I'm on your run of the mill netbook, and was wondering if the netbook version of 10.04 would really be that much better for me than just the normal desktop version.
The Netbook Edition's user interface looks somewhat like a cell phone's user interface, but bigger.
Instead of an usual desktop, you get something like a panel control with options.
Yeah, I saw screenshots on the ubuntu website.  Thanks for the help
